resources.string: Head to the navigation menu to view the categories page. \n\nYou can add a custom category, giving it a name and an associated colour. You can also edit existing categories by tapping them.

Add existing items and create new ones; giving their category and further details. You can also add multiple items at once for enhanced productivity. \n\nTick off items in the shopping list as you go!
Move an item from the shopping list into the pantry and decrement your pantry stock when you use an item. \nYou can also provide the item\'s use by date.
Set your notification preferences to be notified when your pantry items are approaching their use by date.
We hope you enjoy using FullCart!
